Hello blank fragment We are the one for your all kind of daily needs like groceries, vegetables, medicines, stationary etc at your doorstep by your chosen shop within an hour.

Basically, in our app all your nearby shops are shown and you can view and order the items from the shops and it will be deliver within an hour to your doorstep. Our mission is to provide solution to your every possible daily needs and other goods at your door step safely. To be India's most recognized platform in order to fullfill every kind of daily needs and other goods. Customer Commitment
Teamwork
Respect for People
Fast is better than slow A smooth and friendly users experience that has been built to ensures the user seamless adoption.
We deliver all type of goods at your doorstep from your favourite store within an hour.
Fluidity and full integration cover the needs of even the most complex companies. We are glad to hear that you love Grocy.
Would you like to share your experience by rating us on play store? Do you have a suggestion or face some issues?
Let us know in the field below.
